meanings.definition: A Hindu practice in which a widow immolates herself on her husband's funeral pyre.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, sati was considered a way to honor the deceased husband.
meanings.sent2: The ancient tradition of sati is no longer practiced in most parts of the world.
meanings.sent3: The widow's decision to perform sati shocked the entire village.
meanings.sent4: Her act of sati was like a flame of devotion burning brightly in the darkness of grief.
meanings.sent5: The image of sati, though controversial, remains deeply ingrained in history books.
